page.title: 16A DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: I get to school at 08:45. I get my dinner ticket and at 08:55 my friend Sarah and I ring the bell.We then wait outside our classroom for our teacher to say we can enter. While we get on with unfinished work or reading, Mr Summers marks the register and finds out who is staying for dinners or having packed lunch or going home.Then Sarah and I have to ring the bell for assembly.After assembly each group is given their work for the morning.This might be Maths,E.R.I.C.(Enjoyable Reading In Class),Individual Topic, Art or Science. After a certain time the groups change over to do different work.At noon we have lunch. The afternoon is similar to the mornings but we also have Music,Games or Swimming.At 15:00 we usually listen to a story and at 15:30 we ring the home bell.
